thread.title: Starbucks CEO calls arrests of two black men 'reprehensible'

title: Starbucks CEO calls arrests of two black men 'reprehensible'
text:
Starbucks CEO calls arrests of two black men 'reprehensible' 3:32am IST - 01:21 
Starbucks CEO Kevin Johnson will meet with the two black men arrested at one of its Philadelphia cafes last week to apologize for the incident, which has sparked protests and accusations of racial profiling at the coffee chain. Philadelphia leaders say that's not enough.
